Scripts.OnLoad: self:CreateHeader( "Name", "Name", 50, "TextCellTemplate", function(row) return "Test" end) --[[ self:CreateHeader("Name", "Name", 100, "ObjectCellTemplate", function(row) return row.id, row.name end) self:CreateHeader("Location", "Location", 100, "LocationsCellTemplate", function(row) return row.location end) self:CreateHeader("Count", "Count", 100, "CountCellTemplate", function(row) return row.count, row.outof end) self:CreateHeader("%", "Percent", 40, "PercentCellTemplate", function(row) return row.count, row.outof, row.pctstack end) self:CreateRow("ListRowTemplate,PropagateLinks") self:CreateRow("ListRowTemplate,PropagateLinks") ]]
